## BlockSvg.setColour() method

Change the colour of a block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setColour(colour: number | string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  colour | number \| string | HSV hue value, or \#RRGGBB string. |

**Returns:**

void
